segments.text: Miss , would you like to try this free sample of our new suntan cream ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a new product of company this year . It's oil-free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . It feels very light on the skin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It gives your skin a very natural healthy look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the cool smell , too .
segments.speaker: S2
